Title: Establishes a work group to set reimbursement rates for doulas in the state Medicaid program and address other criteria related to their practice
Summary: Establishes a 14 member doula Medicaid reimbursement work group within the department of health to set reimbursement rates for doulas in the state Medicaid program and address other criteria related to their practice; requires the work group to conduct a study and evaluate the costs, benefits and issues that may be associated with Medicaid reimbursement for doulas and for providing doula care to Medicaid recipients; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a work group to set reimbursement rates for doulas in the state Medicaid program and address other criteria related to their practice
